"EWURADZE nye mo hwɛdofo; na hwee nnkeh: "Ɔma meda bea a hɔ yɛ frɔmfrɔm: Ogya me kɔ nsutaae ho."
"Ɔma me kra ho dwe no: Ogya me fa akwantsenenee mu wɔ ne dzin ntsi."

"#Gye 48.15": kaansa menam owu bɔnsa kebii mu mpo a
column5: osiandɛ ɔwoara wɔ me nkyɛn: W’abaa na wo poma

"EWURADZE nye mo hwɛdofo; na hwee nnkeh: "Ɔwo eto mo pon wɔ m’atamfo enyim: Ɔwo edze ngo sera me tsirmu; ema mo kɔɔpow yɛ ma bu do."

"#Gye 48.15": yie na adɔyɛ ara nko na ɔbɛka mo do mo nkwa nda nyinara: Na mebɛtsena EWURADZE fie daa."
